reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 492/98: FARMLAND AND MANAGED FOREST LAND FOR 1998
reg_info.reg_name_text: FARMLAND AND MANAGED FOREST LAND FOR 1998
reg_info.act_under: Local Roads Boards Act   Loi sur les régies des routes locales

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 21 (3) of the Act, “farmland” means land that is farmland for the purposes of subsection 21 (5) of the Provincial Land Tax Act; “managed forest land” means land that is managed forest land for the purposes of subsection 21 (5) of the Provincial Land Tax Act. O. Reg. 492/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 21 (3) of the Act,

“farmland” means land that is farmland for the purposes of subsection 21 (5) of the Provincial Land Tax Act;

“managed forest land” means land that is managed forest land for the purposes of subsection 21 (5) of the Provincial Land Tax Act. O. Reg. 492/98, s. 1.
